Do staff details need to be updated? fam.answer: It is important that all staff maintain a high standard for record keeping. Approved providers and family day care educators are responsible for ensuring that records are: up-to-date and include all the information required.

How many children can you have in family.answer: How many children can a family day care educator look after. You must not educate and care for more than seven children at your residence or approved venue at any one time. This includes: no more than four children preschool age or under.
